title: Hidden Calorie
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Nnn~, so sweet and delicious♪ What are you drinking, Makiko?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Soy latte<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Soy latte is good too, but this seasonal one that Kasumin is drinking right now is really good, you know? Want to try?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>What’s that, corn soup?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>It’s sweet potato and pumpkin! That’s why it’s yellow! Geez, don’t you ever look up time limited stuff, Makiko?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I’m not really interested, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eeeh~, what a waste. It’s really delicious. But it’s not just delicious, it’s also cute. Try it. It’s not like you can’t drink sweet things, right? Right? Right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Okay, I get it…. Ah, it’s good. I like it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Isn’t it? Umm, the detail of this limited version one is written here, look. Here you go<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....Hmm. I can see why you would want to drink it after seeing this<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Right! Kasumin can just keep on drinking this no matter how many cups♡ It can’t be helped, do you want another sip, Makiko?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....But this has quite the calorie, huh. It’s like eating a katsu curry rice calorie-wise<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin is drinking this cute thing, okay, don’t compare it to katsu curry rice!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
